definitions.definition: A mountain range in Italy , stretching 1,200 km from the north to the south of the country, along its east coast, traversing the entire Apennine Peninsula , and often called the "spine of Italy".

main_definition: A mountain range in Italy , stretching 1,200 km from the north to the south of the country, along its east coast, traversing the entire Apennine Peninsula , and often called the "spine of Italy".
